data.text: KNOW HOW TO PLAY FANTASY CRICKET
Learn Team Selection & Fantasy Cricket Point System
Learn Team Selection & Fantasy Cricket Point System
Play over 60+ Games and Win Cash!

description: vpl offers you the chance to play Fantasy Cricket across leagues and international matches. With vpl Fantasy, everyone can use their skills, analytical reasoning and knowledge of cricket to form teams, enter Cricket Fantasy contests, and win big. Users can also improve their team selection skills with our Fantasy Cricket tips. vpl even offers users free practise contests that can help them enhance their skills. So what are you waiting for? Start playing Fantasy Cricket daily on vpl!
vpl offers you the chance to play Fantasy Cricket across leagues and international matches.

Download the vpl app and sign up with your mobile number. Choose Fantasy Cricket. Once you do this, you will be shown a list of matches you can participate in. Select a match to take part in Indian t20 league or any other leagues and start making your pro-Fantasy Cricket team. You will get 100 credits with which you can choose players for your team.
You need 11 players to make a Fantasy Cricket Team:
You can select a maximum of 7 players from one playing side.
You can manage your teams for a match from the 'Your Teams' section. This section can be found in every match on the vpl Fantasy Cricket app.

data.text: How many teams can I create for a single match?

description: The maximum number of teams you can create depends on the contest category. For exavple, a user can create a maximum of 40 teams in a Rumble Cricket Fantasy contest.
Download the vpl app and sign up with your mobile number. Choose Fantasy Cricket. Once you do this, you will be shown a list of matches you can participate in.

content: Captain - The player you choose to be your pro Fantasy Cricket team’s Captain will receive 2X points.
Vice-Captain - The player you choose to be your team’s Vice-Captain will receive 1.5X points.

Starting points are assigned to any player on the basis of the announcement of his/her inclusion in the team. However, in case a player is unable to start the match after being included in the team sheet, he/she will not score any points. Points shall however be awarded (including starting points) to any player who plays as a replacement of such player to whom starting points were initially assigned.
Strike rate scoring is applicable only for strike rate below 70 runs per 100 balls.
None of the events occurring during a Super Over, if any, will be considered for Points to be assigned/applied to a player.

Data is provided by reliable sources and once the points have been marked as covpleted i.e. winners have been declared, no further adjustments will be made. Points awarded live in-game are subject to change as long as the status is 'In progress' or 'Waiting for review'.
Captain - The player you choose to be your pro Fantasy Cricket team’s Captain will receive 2X points.

data.firstLineToshow: Players are awarded points based on their performance. The points system varies based on the format of the match, such as ODIs, Tests, T20Is, etc.
contentList: You should know the points system at the back of your hands as this is what ultimately decides your winnings.
Find out all about the points system

points.text: Half Century Scored (50 Runs and Above)
Century (If score 150+ than awarded Century + Half Century and so on)

data.header: How do I create my team?

description: o to the vpl Fantasy Sports tab and click "Select a match." Now click on "Add team" and create your teams. You can also select a contest and then click on "Register team", where you will be prompted to select the existing team or create a new team.

content.name: Can I change my vpl pro Fantasy Cricket Team?
description: You can make as many changes as you like to your vpl Fantasy Cricket teams until the registration deadline for that match. You can also change your Captain or Vice Captain before the deadline. Select the 'Edit Team' button in your teams to make any changes. Make sure you know which of your players are playing the match, and keep your session updated at all times on the vpl Fantasy Cricket app.

content.name: Unmatched features offered by vpl Fantasy Cricket
description: Now you can avail unlimited withdrawals of your Fantasy Cricket winnings on the vpl app! Sign up today and play Fantasy Cricket to earn money!

content.name: Is playing Fantasy Cricket on vpl absolutely safe and legal?
description: Yes! Fantasy Cricket is classified as a game of skill as per the judgements of the Bombay High Court and the Punjab and Haryana High Court. These judgements have also been affirmed by the Supreme Court. It is covpletely safe and legal to use your cricketing knowledge and analytical skills to play Fantasy Cricket online and earn money!
